FileSort

class FileSort

A class that sorts a file into ascending or descending order.

Summary
FileSortA class that sorts a file into ascending or descending order.
Functions
FileSortInitializes the object.
FileSortInitializes the object.
~FileSortDestroys the object.
SortSorts the data into ascending or descending order.
LoadLoads the data from the file into the array list.
SaveSaves the sorted data to the output file.
CleanStringCleans the string passed into the function of any whitespace.
ClearWhitespaceClears whitespace from the beginning of a file.

Functions

FileSort

FileSort(string oldFileName,
string newFilename,
bool ascending,
long readLength)

Initializes the object.

Parameters

oldFileNameThe name of the file to read data from.
newFilenameThe name of the file to write output to.
ascendingTrue for sorting in ascending order, otherwise false for descending order.
readLengthThe length (in bytes) of data to read at a time.

FileSort

bool ascending)

Initializes the object.

Parameters

oldFilenameThe name of the file to read data from.
ascendingTrue for sorting in ascending order, otherwise false for descending order.

CleanString

string CleanString(string value)

Cleans the string passed into the function of any whitespace.

Parameters

valueThe string to be cleaned.

Returns

A string that has been cleaned of all whitespace.

ClearWhitespace

void ClearWhitespace(void)

Clears whitespace from the beginning of a file.
